text: American Mullet (also known as The Mullet Chronicles) is a 2001 documentary film directed by Jennifer Arnold. The film documents the phenomenon of the mullet hairstyle and the people who wear it. Through their discussion of the mullet, the viewer comes to know the backgrounds of the people featured in the film. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:English- language films Category:2001 documentary films Category:Films about fashion
title: American Mullet
